sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import './App.css'; import api from "./api" import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table' import React from "react" function Utils() { const [devices, setDevices] = useState({ hostname: "", ifname: "", macaddr: "", name: "", nerves: "", version: "", ipaddr: "" }) function buttonDiscoveryClick() { api.getNetworkDiscover(function (res) { console.log(JSON.stringify(res)) res.forEach(deviceRes => { console.log(deviceRes.data.ipaddr) const device = { hostname: deviceRes.data.hostname, ifname: deviceRes.data.ifname, macaddr: deviceRes.data.macaddr, name: deviceRes.data.name, nerves: deviceRes.data.nerves, version: deviceRes.data.variant, ipaddr: deviceRes.data.ipaddr } devices.push(device) }); console.log(`Es mi array interno ${JSON.stringify(devices[0])}`) }) } return ( <>
Name Address Age
{devices.ipaddr}
) } export default Utils;
